text.autoconfig.compass3d.title: Compass3D
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.disable: Disables the mod so that overlay icons are not displayed.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.renderF: Whether to render an arrow over supported compasses placed in Item Frames.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.stacked: Scale of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.framedS: Scale of the rendered arrow over framed compasses.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.transla: The horizontal offset of the icon, from left to right.
The vertical offset of the icon, from top to bottom.
In/out offset. Use when other mods cover / are covered by this.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.stacked: Horizontal offset of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
Vertical offset of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
In/out offset of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.framedT: These settings behave differently from how they work for items in the inventory. The defaults are settings that work for me, but feel free to experiment to find one that you like.
How far to the right of center should the icon be.
How far up should the icon be.
How far "out" of the block the arrow should be rendered.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.vanilla: The following settings can be used to change or disable the icons shown on specific compasses. DEFAULT uses the default arrows, or the arrows set by resource packs. MATCH_COMPASS_STYLE will use the icon designed to match the colors of the compass. DISABLED disables the mod for that kind of compass.
For this compass, there is no difference between DEFAULT and MATCH_COMPASS_STYLE.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.lodesto: UPDATE - As of v2.2.0, using MATCH_COMPASS_STYLE will add the enchantment glint to the arrow.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.netheri: The following options have been disabled. I did this because their corresponding mods have not been updated to 1.20.5 yet.
Added by another mod; has no effect if that mod is not present.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.oreComp: Added by another mod; has no effect if that mod is not present.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.darkCom: Added by another mod; has no effect if that mod is not present.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.portalC: Added by another mod; has no effect if that mod is not present.
